description: It's the best time of year for apple cider cocktails. Apple Cider Margaritas are a twist on the traditional&nbsp;margarita that is perfect for Thanksgiving celebrations. This drink has an apple-cinnamon flavor with some sweetness from sugar and lime juice. And best of all, it only takes minutes to prepare!
name: Apple Cider Margarita
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup Freshly squeezed lemon juice
Apple slices and cinnamon sticks for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a pitcher, combine cider, tequila, and lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.text: In a pitcher, combine cider, tequila, and lemon juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Dip glasses in water, then into a mixture of sugar, cinnamon, and salt.
recipeInstructions.text: Dip glasses in water, then into a mixture of sugar, cinnamon, and salt.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill with margarita, and garnish with an apple slice and cinnamon stick.
